prompt: This artwork depicts a stunning futuristic scene where a riot police robot, towering in its metallic armor, is mounted on a majestic alien-like horse. In the style reminiscent of John Schoenherr, the image captures the juxtaposition of advanced technology against a backdrop of a martial landscape from the future. The intricate details and dynamic composition of the piece transport the viewer to a world where science fiction blends seamlessly with a sense of foreboding tension.
